overview: The documentary follows a truck of pilgrims on their pilgrimage from Fernandes, in the municipality of Arapiraca, in Alagoas, to Juazeiro - a journey of 700 km covered in 16 hours. Testimonies of former pilgrims and their descendants established in Juazeiro, today a commercial center with 180 thousand inhabitants, outline the historical and legendary profile of Father Cícero.
title: Os Romeiros do Padre Cícero
